entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 10:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
